title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Is the World of Hyatt credit card worth the annual fee?

items.description: American Airlines AAdvantage may not partner with Chase Ultimate Rewards, but there are still easy ways to redeem Chase points for American flights.

items.title: Which purchases count as dining with the Chase Sapphire Preferred and Chase Sapphire Reserve?

items.title: Free cookie alert: Stop at any DoubleTree by Hilton this monday and get a free cookie
items.description: National Chocolate Chip Cookie Day is Aug. 4, and DoubleTree by Hilton is giving away free cookies, even if you're not staying at the hotel.

items.title: Monthly checklist: Credit card perks and benefits you should be using in August
